    When Specialty Drugs Are No Longer in the Minority

    07 June 2016

    By Steven Lucio PharmDAssociate Vice President, Pharmacy Services

    One of the areas of greatest concern for pharmacy practice, in terms of both cost and impact on patient care, is the increasing development of pharmaceuticals that could be classified as “specialty.” While there is no universally accepted definition of a specialty drug, most characterizations…
